page.title: 183.5 MILLION ARE OUT OF A JOB
page.content: My name is Tom O'kane. I live down { {Cilonnen Road}next to{Three Crosses.} It is a very rural area and there are not many houses within a mile. I am 12 years old. The world we live in is a world of modernization. I go to{ {Bishopston}school although I am}nearer {Gowerton}school. About 3.5 million are out of jobs. Lately there has been an outbreak of AID's. Drugs are quite normal to hear of in{Bishopston}but police are not doing anything about them. President Reagan has just met with the Russian leader who does not want Star Wars project to go ahead. My main hobbies are golfing, surfing and sailing. Talking of modernization they are threatening to knock down {Carmel Chapel}which is a very old chapel down my road. TOM O'KANE 2P
